name: Beetlejuice: Bad as Can
description:
Play as Beetlejuice, the greatest Wack Packer of all time, in this hilariously wacky adventure.

Can you stop the evil Cow BoBo?

You have 8 insane Super Power Ups at your disposal. Use them wisely if you plan to stop the evil Cow BoBo.

The power ups include:
- StrongBeet
- ArmyBeet
- BunnyBeet
- OgreBeet
- BeetSkywalker
- BigHeadBeet
- TrumpBeet
- MiniMeBeet

Explore seven crazy worlds, fight bosses, find hidden secrets, and save humanity!

Good Luck!
